website_summaries.verdict: Industrial style fan that will move a lot of air and give you good longevity.
pros: Features an 18-inch diameter that is a popular size
Steel construction should give you a nice level of longevity
Motor is of a good quality to ensure a steady level of operation
Gives you three fan speed options by using the pull cord
Heavy-duty fan that has some heft to it
cons: Will cost a bit more than other options
Tends to run a little loud

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This fan works great. I have it hung in the corner of my screened in patio. I live in Florida and it is currently 93 degrees out. Sitting outside with the fan on setting 2/3 and feel great.. only drawback to the fan is that it does not turn left and right. I had to mount the fan at an angle so that it would face the middle of the room. I would suggest having a friend handy to help install. In total it weighs about 25lbs. Not the easiest on your own but it can be done.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond McKenney

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Fan, Vibrates on low speed
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Delivered fast. Decent price for the quality of the product. Heavy duty brackets. Cons: The instructions tell you to mount the bracket under the wall mount. This leaves very minimal movement of the fan side to side. I had to bolt it over the top of the wall mount to help with this. Out out of the two fans that I ordered, one has a noticeable vibration on low speed. (Hopefully it doesnt affect the motor in the long run.) The wall mount does not come with hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Just purchased 2 more 2 years later!
customer_reviews.text: I live on the sea and we have these behind the house in our goat pen so they don’t get the salt air directly. They last 2 years and rusted. We cleaned them up and painted them with rustoleum to get more life outta them. The pull chains lasted a couple of months and we’ve been replacing and fixing these ever since. We did, however, just buy 2 more and I’m not sorry we did. 2 years is a lifetime for something that’s not marine grade stainless steel to last in salt air.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fan
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to replace an older air king fan that was plastic and less powerful. This fan is much better than the 1 it replaced. After reading other reviews, I did go to the local hardware store and bought rubber spacers to minimalize vibration once the mounting bracket is fastened to the wall. This can moves a tremendous amount of air compared to my old wall mounted fan!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Made it for 6 years .....
customer_reviews.text: Have had this fan for 6 yrs.... I has been used exclusively in the garage in the insane Texas heat. I moved during that time and took the fan with me. After 6 years the the metal clips that attach the fan to the bracket gave way. The fan still works great but is of no use since it can no longer be hung from the wall or ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: swt

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: It is very heavy making it a two person install. Moves a huge amount of air on low. I read reviews and saw complaints about vibration so installed heavy neoprene behind mount and on pivot screw. Very quiet, no problems. I use it in my leather shop. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fan.  Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fan for my covered patio. I have 2 large tables of orchids. It puts out really good airflow. My husband mounted the fan on top the bracket to get better angles for airflow. The only issue i have is the vibration. How do you make it stop?
customer_reviews.author: PHYLLIS G.

customer_reviews.title: This is the LUXURY edition fan for a Horse Stall.  You will be pleased!
customer_reviews.text: This fan is built a lot better than fans seen in most horse barns. This is a common size for bungeeing to the bars of a horse stall. But most people buy the cheaper units available. This one looks like it will easily last longer than it's higher price. Sometimes it is less expensive to buy the unit that costs more money - but is higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: ClevelandBill

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect Installation Harware
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a 6" long bolt to attach fan to mounting bracket which is about 3" too long. Installation instructions don't include parts list to verify correct parts were received. Doesn't include any hardware needed to mount to wall/ceiling. Once I find the correct bolt and other mounting hardware, it should be pretty easy to mount.
customer_reviews.author: James S

customer_reviews.title: Missing some stuff
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with the mounting screws. I had a couple fortunately. The fan vibrates a bit when on low, so it’s not a constant, even sound more like a slowly revving engine. Does blow a cool breeze at my bed. The plastic casing around the motor was cracked but I chose to install it anyway as it would be a hassle to return.
customer_reviews.author: MsC

customer_reviews.title: Great Product but arrived late
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these fans in June, it arrived very quickly and we loved it, so we immediately ordered a second. We live in Mississippi so this is the hottest time of the year. This order however, was no longer on sale so we paid $40 more for it, and it took 4 weeks longer than estimated to arrive. Overall, this transaction did not leave us near as satisfied as the other one.
customer_reviews.author: Hillaire

customer_reviews.title: a bit load but not to bad.
customer_reviews.text: Mounted them to the ceiling of our covered back patio. They move a lot of air. a bit load but not to bad.
customer_reviews.author: TNelson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Horse Barns
customer_reviews.text: Great as a stall fan for horses. Enclosed motor kept the barn safe while multiple speeds kept them cool and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Skylar1907

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fan, but do not purchase additional mounting bracket
customer_reviews.text: the mounting bracket is included with this item. Amazon shows you need to purchase it also. I made mistake and purchased it and I'm now trying to return to seller. Nothing wrong with fan. I have several of this in my horse barn. Very good fan.
customer_reviews.author: tracey fulton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fans!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fans!! Only reason for a 4 star rating was because with the angled bracket on the fan instead of the round bracket like on the 20" model. It doesn't allow you to rotate the fan but about 1 1/2" either way. I solved this by mounting it on top of the wall bracket instead of underneath it.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Fury

customer_reviews.title: Powerful for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love the power this fan has for the price. Built very solid and sturdy. The most is also very strong. Only down in my opinion is that the mount does not give much room for left and right adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas T.

customer_reviews.title: Loud and low range of motion.
customer_reviews.text: Real loud. If u care about hearing your friends or TV the air king is not for you. The fan only turns maybe 25 degrees. If u need to turn the fan in your direction, it might not work.
customer_reviews.author: ITPro

customer_reviews.title: Works well however it doesn't really have a Low mode
customer_reviews.text: This was installed on a porch and it works well however even Low is pretty high volume of air. Also the hanging mount restricts the angle of movement much more then expected side to side and upwards.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Serious Fan!
customer_reviews.text: Very solid construction, moves air quietly at low speed. Installed into deck railing to discourage mosquitos and allow for direction of air flow.
customer_reviews.author: Werner Buckl

customer_reviews.title: Fan blades are unbalanced and the fan shakes when on
customer_reviews.text: The fan shakes on the bracket when turned on. This makes a loud sound and also rattles the wall. This is a poor quality product from my experience.
customer_reviews.author: vtxdrew

customer_reviews.title: Great fan!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome fan. Mounted under covered patio to the brick of the house. Need to ensure to use heavy duty masonry bolts. No vibration at all and worked straight out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Andy W.

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and powerful fan!
customer_reviews.text: I use this fan in my horse stalls. It is very powerful, yet so much quieter than the previous fans I had.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Very bad product. Not sure if I got a bad batch, but I went thru two of these and each one ran for about an hour and then died. I really blame it on poor qaulity control. I will give 5 stars to the merchant "S and C green world supply". They literally responded to my return request within hours and took care of everything with no questions asked. I ended buying the 9020 and it is vastly superior to this model. The 9020 fan operates much quieter and blow a lot more air. Bottom line skip this model and do the 9020...it is only about 2 to 3 inches in diameter bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken
customer_reviews.text: Fan arrived broken; all threaded screw holes in plastic housing for motor were cracked. Wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fan. Delivery as expected! Perfect replacement for the original fan
customer_reviews.author: ISS S.

customer_reviews.title: It puts out alot of air-its awesome
customer_reviews.text: Put it under my patio and puts out a lot of air. Plan on buying two more.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It does the job in my garage but it definitely has noticeable vibration as if fan blades are unbalanced..
customer_reviews.author: B Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great fan for horse stall
customer_reviews.text: The fan came quickly, was easy to install and keeps my horse cool.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Singleton

customer_reviews.title: I love the strong breeze as I jog
customer_reviews.text: I use it in my 10' X 12' exercise room; especially when I'm on the treadmill. I love the strong breeze as I jog. I've been using it for about a year without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i give it a five, i got one out of 2. hope the other shows up soon.
customer_reviews.author: KELLY

customer_reviews.title: Great product but 20" will be the way to go
customer_reviews.text: I need it to move the air in both my garage and the patio, so I end up installing one on each location and it works awesome. One thing I did was to use rubber washers to mitigate the vibration. The noise I believe is minimum for the air flow. We have the 20" and the 18", If you look at it next to each other, just buy the 20" because it moves more air.
customer_reviews.author: Julito

customer_reviews.title: Moves lots of air
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and really makes a difference on hot summer days
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Good solid air mover. Good value for the price. Keeps the air flowing nicely on our good sized screen porch.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A. Hackmann

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Powerful ...a little loud when cranked up but that's expected.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: so operationally it is great, I am however a bot disappointed that the ...
customer_reviews.text: Product moves a LOT of air, so operationally it is great, I am however a bot disappointed that the framework is rusting after only being up for two weeks
customer_reviews.author: Graeme R. Maccallum

customer_reviews.title: No good!
customer_reviews.text: Got this fan to mount under a shade structure, it ran about five minutes and then kicked the GFI plug. It then did not work. While it was working, it vibrated badly on low and medium speed. I would beware of it. Update: the return went extremely well and the fan sent as replacement worked, although it does have the vibration also. I can't complain about the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product but the design of the mount puts a limit on the position of the fan
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Would definettly buy again...
customer_reviews.text: I just installed this week in my converted garage shop. I gave 4 stars just because the way the wall bracket is made, reduces the horizontal fan positions. I did create a mounting "sandwich" of 3 pieces of 3/4 plywood. This moves the fan out from the wall 2 3/4 inches which I like. Lots of air movement. Great product, high quality
customer_reviews.author: John S.Harris

customer_reviews.title: We just love this fan
customer_reviews.text: We just love this fan. It really blows air even on low. Only tiny complaint is it is noisy. BUT that to me is not an issue, as the airflow is what I needed. Totally pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Violet

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Moves the right amount of air and was easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sir king fan
customer_reviews.text: been having fan for 6 years fan vibrates a lot and the brackets that hold it to wall bracket crack after about a year of use I made my on brackets and fan is still running still vibrating but still running it does blow a lot of air but for the price they need better heavy duty brackets
customer_reviews.author: big al

customer_reviews.title: Good fan, wrong mounting hardware included.
customer_reviews.text: So great fan and heavy duty mount, but came with hardware that either allowed it to rotate freely (long bolt only partially threaded), or so short it wouldn’t rotate at all (I tried a short bolt I had lying around, but then it hit the crossbrace on the mount when you tried to turn it. I spent about $10 to get some longer, fully threaded stainless bolts and other hardware to drop it enough to clear the crossbrace, and still be able to tighten the fan down, now it works great. Maybe I just got the wrong hardware pack with it?
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: One Powerful Fan!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this fan for my garage. It arrived well packed. It’s impressive and heavy duty with a solid bracket to mount on the wall or ceiling. I mounted mine on the ceiling to hang down. You’ll need to purchase wood screws and washers to mount. Unfortunately there is no mount screws included. I also purchased a longer chain to add to the short one included. I purchased both at my local Lowe’s store. The fan is louder than expected but it definitely cools my workout and work bench area. Also since it hangs from the calling it doesn’t take up and floor space too.
customer_reviews.author: john markisz

customer_reviews.title: Best fan you can buy for a workshop
customer_reviews.text: This fan is meant to last. I originally purchased a clone of it from Menards- it rattled and overheated. This fan is very nice. It comes with the wall bracket and long power cord. Quality is excellent. Pushes a LOT of air. Overall I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great fan for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Second one of these I've purchased. First one was for an outdoor porch. Puts out ALOT of air when on high, will blow your hair back 20 feet away. Works well on low too. Intalled this one in our green house and run it 10 hours a day on low.
customer_reviews.author: T. Matthew Workman

customer_reviews.title: High Airflow - Low Noise
customer_reviews.text: These fans move more air at their lowest RPM speed than most fans do at highest RPM speed and the sound is a low hum that is not disruptive or overbearing. If you are looking to move a lot of air without a lot of noise, this is a good option.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Wakefield

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan! I have a Fitness Studio and this works great in my space. Its a bit loud even on low, but it does the job. No Complaints, especuilly living in the desert. LOVE.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy Dallas Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan
customer_reviews.text: We installed this in our garage for we have our weight equipment and exercise room. The three speeds are great. It was easy to install and works fantastic. Noise level is good. Hardly even notice it running.
customer_reviews.author: jeff pasley

customer_reviews.title: Love this fan
customer_reviews.text: Super high quality fan! Mounted under an event in our courtyard and it does a wonderful job. Combined with a mist system, it's magical!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry G

customer_reviews.title: Vesrsatile, powerful, and quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fan. Incredibly quiet. Mounting hardware and bracket makes it easy to install anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Powerful but loud
customer_reviews.text: I work in a factory that uses these fans, so I knew it was a powerful fan before I purchased. And I do mean powerful. This thing can be easily felt from a 50 ft. distance on low. Only drawback is the noise, didn't realize how loud it was till it went from a ~10,000 sq. ft. assembly floor to a ~800 sq. ft. garage. But worth it for working in a hot garage in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Adam J Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Industrial Grade!
customer_reviews.text: Instructions to mount fan were ok. Fan is heavy duty and weighs a lot more than you think. Be sure to install it into a stud in the wall. Fan does casue vibrations of the wall.
customer_reviews.author: D417RiCeR

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: This fan is great in my garage, moves A LOT of air. It is noisy, but that’s what my radio is for!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: This thing blows!
customer_reviews.text: But in a good way. I generally leave it on low when I need it to run, and it moves a lot of air.
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What a great fan to have in the patio area.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo

customer_reviews.title: Good quality fan for a good price
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality fan. Parts are made of metal, fan blades and “L” bracket. The fan is powerful good air flow. Good value
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Easy to install using lag bolts. Industrial motor much more powerful than cheaper, wimpy fans.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Had to send first one back!
customer_reviews.text: First one shipped without mounting bracket, second one came very quickly! The fan works great but it does not swing very far from side to side.
customer_reviews.author: Radondasabual

customer_reviews.title: poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: Received first fan with poor packaging...box was open, no protective packaging material, , parts were missing and paint was scraped off fan unit; replacement not much better..box partially open, no packaging material to protect fan, and scratched paint. Fan unit itself is outstanding. Disappointed in Amazon; never had this problem in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Doug D. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Actually is was way too big for what I needed. I had a 16" fan that quit on me so I thought an industrial would last longer. Did not realize how much bigger and heavier this was. So I had to return it. Seems like a good fan, but was just way too big for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna

product_meta.title: Air King 9518 18-Inch Industrial Grade Wall Mount Fan, 1/6-Horsepower,Black
product_meta.description: Style Name:FanThe Air King 9518 18-Inch Industrial Grade Wall Mount Fan is ideal for plants, warehouses, large offices and other industrial spaces that require powerful air circulation. This 18-inch, 3-blade fan is constructed of powder coated steel for long-lasting durability. The pull cord switch located on the back allow you to turn the fan on or off and change between (3) speeds. The 1/6-horsepower permanently lubricated motor provides a quiet performance and produces a lot of air flow. The 1 phase motor also features a permanent split capacitor and runs at 120-volts. Additionally, this fan is ETL and OSHA approved and a 9-foot, 3-conductor type SPT power cord is provided for long reach. Measures 24-inches long by 16.5-inches wide by 28-inches high and weighs 24.8-pounds. The Air King 9518 18-Inch Industrial Grade Wall Mount Fan comes with a 1-year limited warranty. Air King offers a full line of industrial grade and commercial grade air circulating fan solutions to meet almost any need you might have. Whether your need is in industrial settings such as manufacturing plants and warehouses or more commercial setting such as offices, schools or hospitals - Air King has the perfect solution for you. Powerful motors that last for years and years are what Air King's Air Circulators have come to been know as and we are not stopping now. Visit www.amazon.com/airking for more information on Air King and our extensive line of products.
feature_bullets: Constructed of powder coated steel for long-lasting durability
Comes with a 1-year limited warranty; Dimensions (Length/Width/Height) - 24" x 16.5" x 28"

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars140 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
